author: mcslee
msg: Thrift compiler to tokenize args by " " so you can use script files
Summary: if you do #!/usr/local/bin/thrift --php --cpp it shows up as one arg: "--php --cpp" so you need to tokenize that

author: mcslee
msg: Add socket and server socket timeout support to thrift java

author: mcslee
msg: Fix potential multithreading protocol issue in Thrift Java
